definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Today, the only remaining trackers pulled tourists upstream.
sentences.chinese: 如今碩果僅存的縴夫將遊客拉到上游。

sentences.english: Hitched to lines made of bamboo, straining with bent backs, their fingers almost touched the ground.
sentences.chinese: 縴夫扯着竹繩彎腰使勁，手指幾乎觸地。

sentences.english: In early 2010, it is controversial for its recovery of "naked trackers".
sentences.chinese: 2010年初，這裏因爲恢復“裸體縴夫”飽受爭議。

sentences.english: They pull on the river left a string of footprints, it was wayfarers ellipsis of life.
sentences.chinese: 縴夫在河邊留下一串腳印，那是跋涉者生活的省略號。

sentences.english: Contemporary boat tracker, it has much to love?
sentences.chinese: 當代縴夫，那能有幾多愛？

sentences.english: The towers are dragging a ship.
Towing harnesses slip off easily should the current drag pullers backward.
sentences.chinese: 由於拉縴容易滑倒，而今的縴夫必須避免。

definition: Lancang River of Qinghai and Yunnan, the upper reaches of Mekong River 湄公河[Mei2 gong1 He2] of Southeast Asia
the country ruined and the people starving (idiom)
The Legend of the Red Lantern
mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
lit. dragons and snakes mingle (idiom)/fig. a mix of good people and scumbags
turbid flow/muddy waters/fig. a contemptible person/fig. corrupt or disgraceful social trends
all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice
